posts.post_content:
I have this list of t206s (SEE IMAGE ON BOTTOM) Id be willing to trade. I’m looking for tougher backs, old mill southern leaguers, and hall of famers as shown below. If you’d like pictures please PM or email at [url]wazywhoa@gmail.com[/url]. I have a lot of additional trade material -- just PM me for a list of others: 

Main interests are bolded:

Cobb - bat off/green - have a SGC 1 that I want to upgrade

Evers - port/blue sky - off back preferred 
Keeler - batting - off back preferred  - have an SGC 1 Sovereign to upgrade
Matty - portrait - Id like to upgrade my 1.5 
Tinker - any pose - off back preferred 
Lajoie - portrait/throwing - off back preferred 
Young - portrait - have a SGC 1.5 - would like an off back
Wallace - portrait - off back preferred 
Speaker - to upgrade my SGC 2
Waddell - any pose  - off back preferred 
Walsh - off back preferred 

Old Mill/Hindu SLers I need -- :

Dan

Won't bump this again for a while, but wanted to add some pictures of the cards I have in hand. The remainder of that list is either at SGC or traded. Gandil I'd like to hold on to and Dummy is also sold
Cobb is gone, as well as several of the commons. I've picked up quite a bit of Sovereigns (some HOFers) and Old Mills. PM/Email if you'd like to discuss

[quote name="wazoo" post=2150104]Cobb is gone, as well as several of the commons. I've picked up quite a bit of Sovereigns (some HOFers) and Old Mills. PM/Email if you'd like to discuss[/QUOTE]

Farewell, Bat On Cobb. It was nice flirting with you the last several months…
